text:
servlet.getServletContext().getRequestDispatcher() returns null if supplied 
with a URI containing a semi-colon.

i.e.

servlet.getServletContext().getRequestDispatcher("/test.jsp?
message=colon;colon");

Even if you use response.encodeURL() to encode the URL before passing it to 
getRequestDispatcher(), the semi-colon remains and confuses getRequestDispatcher
().

Full test case available on request.
creator: richard.strutt@northgate-is.com
remm@apache.org
text:
encodeURL appends the session ID if needed. That's it. So you have a badly
placed path parameter in your URL, which is a problem.
